text:
I had a very friendly agent who loved to help whenever necessary.  I can recall when we a fire in our shed which also hit the house.  We left a voicemail that same night and first thing in the morning, the agent called us at the hotel with a very concerned tone and wanted to know what had happened.  We got together with the agent and put us up in a hotel for a few days and then,  he let us rent a house for about 6 months, which was paid by Farmers'.  itself.  When we returned home.  The home had been upgraded beyond our expectations.  We are still living here and still enjoy it immensely.  Farmers' as a company has been absolutely sympathetic to our dilemma and most helpful.  They were prompt in sending us and the contractor the checks so we could get back home as quickly as possible.  God bless the company and the agent in question.

Joseph Thibodeau.

name: Ron Daly
text:
Reggie and his team are nothing short of the best in the business. Recently I was reaching a deadline on coverage due to Gold Fortification backlogs. What actually happened is Reggie responded back to me minutes later and advised he had addressed the issue at 6am that morning (Saturday!!!). I will say that if you are needing insurance or do not have an agent that would do this for you, I would certainly rethink what you are getting for your hard earned money.

Thank you again Reggie!

text: Reggie and the staff here are the most amazing folks to have handle your insurance needs! They go above and beyond to make sure you are taken care of. Reggie

name: Madelaine Miller
text: I cannot give Coastal Alabama enough stars!  They were extremely, extremely responsive, friendly, and proactive. I put in an online inquiry around 8:30 at night, expecting to hear back the next day or so.  Not even 15 minutes later, I received a call from Reggie!  The most outstanding insurance company I will ever use, all-around.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so so much for the kind words and taking your time to tell the world what you think about our small agency. We take our role in your busy life seriously, and know that timely communication is what you need and expect from your insurance agency. Cheers to you my friend!-Reggie

name: Justin Pratt
text: The staff here has been exceptional with our entire experience since being a client. The staff is extremely helpful and responsive and truly has had our best interest in mind. I would highly recommend them for all your insurance needs in Gulf Shores and the surrounding areas. Huge shout out as well to Kendra. We have enjoyed working with her and she is a great asset to them.

resp.text: Kendra is an angel, and she has helped HUNDREDS of friends and clients like yourself process and move through this difficult and often frustrating claims process. We at Coastal Alabama Insurance take our role seriously, and insurance is only worth as much as your claims experience. Thank you for the review, your trust and business, and your kind words.

Smooth transition into a rental and all is good. Thanks, Reggie!

resp.text:
Best. Review. Ever.
From one of the best families ever.
We are here 24/7 for all insurance needs.

text: The whole team at Coastal Alabama Insurance was fantastic! Quick response time. Very happy with their claims process and friendly service.

name: anne moss
text: I hate insurance. Until I found this company. They lowered my premiums substantially, while lowering my deductible amount 2%. The service is great, and everybody there truly seems to care about their customers. This is the best insurance agency I've ever used. I've been through 1 hurricane and 1 tornado with them and they made sure I was taken care of. I would never think of using another agency in this area again.

resp.text: Anne, you were one of our first clients at our small agency in 2017. And, I recall how much you HATED insurance, and you made it known to me how little you think about the business. Fast forward 4 LONG years, and we have had two major weather events and a couple of claims. Thank you for the kind words, and the continued trust to handle your insurance needs.

name: Jamie Smith
text: Reggie Pulliam is a gem!  He sacrificed a Sunday with his family to mediate and help solve a problem I was having with my roofer and insurance agent from another local insurance company. I cannot imagine a more dedicated agent.

resp.text: Really appreciate the kind words. Insurance is sometimes complicated and often frustrating, especially with claims. Thanks for the time to leave the review. Means a lot.-Reggie

text:

She patiently guided me and consistently communicated with me every step of the way.

Kendra’s expertise, professionalism and courteous customer service are truly an asset to your agency and will greatly enhance its future success. Thank you for the pleasure of working with her.

Regards,
Donna Perry
Hattiesburg, MS

Thank you so much, Donna. We take claims seriously at our agency, and Sally, while stressful, has given us the opportunity to show our local community and friends and clients how valuable great insurance agents are. Kendra is a blessing to all who know her. She is INCREDIBLE!
So many times, we have held firm, pointed to the contract (which you and others pay for), and demanded rightful compensation. It isn't always an easy or quick process, but we are resolved in our process at our agency.

name: John Hawk
text: Highest rate quotes that I've ever been given! Not sure how they can stay in business charging theses kind of ridiculous high rates?

resp.text: I, Reggie Pulliam, just got off the phone with Mr Hawk. Mr Hawk has been looking at several properties to buy in our area, and has chosen one in Elberta, AL. He contacted us for a home insurance quote, and we shopped all available markets to us and gave him a price. He was unsatisfied with the price. The price which we can't control. I asked him if he had received other proposals, and he had not. I explained to him that insurance along the Gulf Coast is much different than in Ohio, and that the price of $3,000 isn't out of line with our market. I asked how he can consider our price high if he had not received other proposals. He then said if he can't get better offers he would give us a call back. I asked him not to.-Reggie C Pulliam

name: Scott Sexton
text: I have worked with Coastal Alabama Insurance for over 2 years and have been pleasantly surprised by their Professionalism and Attention to detail.   After a recent automobile wreck, Coastal Insurance informed me of Diminished Value......I have been driving for more than 30 years and have had 3 or 4 claims during that time.   Not once has any other Insurance Agency ever informed  me of Diminished Value ---- After a claim, most Insurance Companies do in fact pay the claim, but your car is now worth less than it was prior to the accident, even after repairs;  this is obvious to most people.  What is Not obvious or well known, is that Reputable Carriers will also pay you an amount of money, based on a particular formula, in addition to paying for the cost of the repairs.  This additional money covers the reduced value of your car --- but your Insurance Company will not tell you about this.....Reggie, with Coastal Insurance, not only told me about this, but his website even has a calculator for customers to determine the approximate amount of additional money you may be entitled to receive.

resp.text: Your words mean the world to us. Thank you for your trust and business. Glad we could help you out and hopefully our information will help others, whether they are clients or just people looking for professional agents who can help out in their times of need.

I went back to ask for flood insurance after Hurricane Sally (September 2020) because FEMA deemed my property to be in a flood zone.  Waited a month.  Called again and left a message.  Talked to Paul himself this time, who said he'd check and call me back. Waited another month and nothing.  I risked just showing up at their office next. I spoke to the other guy who said he'd tell Paul to call me.  It's now January 2021 and I'm still waiting.  The Insurance agency they set me up with won't deal with me directly. name: Crimson Viceroy
text: Mark was very unresponsive when I first approached him in getting a quote for home insurance.  He would not return any emails or voicemails and when an initial introduction was made, it was very mechanical.  Not to mention, that he had no credible information with which to properly gauge what sort of nominal protection I would need for my home.  I am a first time homeowner and you would think that in the insurance business, most agents would be quite adept at offering some really good information regarding protective countermeasures that your home would benefit in having or some good tips on how to help prevent certain problems with the home.  Sure you could Google the information, but then what would be the use of having a "certified and expert insurance agent" like Holley if he refuses to answer questions.  Overall, I would either find another agent in the Farmer's Insurance community or I would simply keep shopping around.  The beautiful thing about free enterprise capitalism is that you're not necessarily stuck doing business with unprofessional and uncaring folks such as Mr. Holley.

So now I have to wait for it to hit my account, get a fee for over draft from my bank, and late fees from all of the other bills that were coming out of that acount that day. I'm supposed to send them bank statements to be refunded. But what do they do before I have the chance. They try to pull it from my account again. And again they can do nothing. My car payment and my credit card payment are coming out of my account today as well.  So looks like I'll have even more late fees. They are an absolute nightmare to work with. Do not trust these people with your bank information.

Complete waste of time, called to get a quote at 2:30pm on 5/21 and agent says he will contact me no later than 10am the next day and no call back received so I call around lunch time receptionist says he's out to lunch so I finally get a call back around 3pm telling me they can't beat my current rate because one of their software programs they use is showing I had 2 accidents on my record which was untrue because I've never had a wreck in my life.

I call my current insurance provider who I was insured with at the time of these supposid accidents and guess what? They don't have a record of them either and neither does my local DMV.

The agent was really nice but my god if your using software that gives you obvious incorrect information and your using that information to provide potential customers quotes..i would suggest investing into an alternative.

resp.text: Hello Greg, we are truly sorry to hear about your struggle concerning your auto quote. Insurance can be complicated enough, and we recognize the frustration of an undesirable outcome. We strive to provide the highest quality of service in every interaction with our customers and take any discontent very seriously. Our CEO has reached out and left his personal contact information in order to rectify this situation. We hope to hear back from you.
